sentences.en: Angela's $7,000 tuition at University this year will be paid for with scholarships.
sentences.cn: 安杰拉将用奖学金支付今年7，000美元的大学学费。
每年的花销、学费和各项杂费6,600英镑。

sentences.en: He received tuition in painting for one year.

sentences.cn: 他一年的学费是两千美元.
他一年的学费是两千美元。

sentences.en: His parents were beginning to groan about the price of college tuition.
sentences.cn: 他的父母开始抱怨大学的学费太贵。

sentences.en: I had to have extra tuition in maths.
sentences.cn: 我不得不上数学补习课。

sentences.en: I'll have to cough up $10,000 a year for tuition.
sentences.cn: 我每年将不得不付1万美元的学费。

sentences.en: Is the money sufficient to cover the tuition?
sentences.cn: 这笔钱付学费够 吗 ?

sentences.en: Is this money enough for the tuition fee?
sentences.cn: 这些钱交学费够 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mary has derived a lot of benefit from her tuition.
sentences.cn: 玛丽从她的教学中得到很大收益.

sentences.en: No tuition was charged by the school, which solicited contributions from the society's members.
sentences.cn: 学校不收学费，所需资金向协会会员募集。

sentences.en: She received private tuition in French.
Students can apply for individual tuition.
sentences.cn: 学生可以申请个别指导.

sentences.en: The courses will give the beginner personal tuition in all types of outdoor photography.
sentences.cn: 该课程将为初学者一对一地讲授各种户外摄影技巧。

sentences.en: The tuition fees may be remitted.
When I started college, tuition was $350 a quarter.
sentences.cn: 我开始念大学的时候，学费是每学季350美元。

sentences.en: When I started college, tuition was 350 a quarter.
sentences.cn: 我开始念大学的时候，学费是每学季350美元。
